metadata.title: USN-7015-2 -- Python vulnerabilities
metadata.description: USN-7015-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in Python. This update provides one of the corresponding updates for python2.7 for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS,  Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, and Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, and a second for  python3.5 for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Python allowed excessive backtracking while   parsing certain tarfile headers. A remote attacker could possibly use   this issue to cause Python to consume resources, leading to a denial   of service. This issue only affected python3.5 for   Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (CVE-2024-6232)   It was discovered that the Python http.cookies module incorrectly   handled parsing cookies that contained backslashes for quoted   characters. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause   Python to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.   (CVE-2024-7592)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7015-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  idle-python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 libpython2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 libpython2.7-dev - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 python2.7-dev - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 python2.7-doc - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 python2.7-examples - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 python2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.18+esm10 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro  idle-python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 libpython3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 libpython3.5-dev - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 libpython3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 libpython3.5-stdlib - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 libpython3.5-testsuite - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5-dev - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5-doc - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5-examples - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 python3.5-venv - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.13+esm14 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
